#Steps needed to make signal-collect scala for large graphs

= Introduction =

= On Disk Storage =
Signal-collet allows the user to store vertices on disk to increase the numer of vertices that fit into one graph and overcome the constraint due to limited main memory.

== MongoDB==
===MongoDB Installation===
A very straight forward installation tutorial can be found in the MongoDB documentation wiki: 
[http://www.mongodb.org/display/DOCS/Quickstart]

The most important Steps are summarized here:

===OSX Installation===
The easiest way to install MongoDB is via [http://www.macports.org MacPorts] or [http://mxcl.github.com/homebrew Homebrew] package manager.

For Macports use:
{{{
$ sudo port install mongodb
}}}

With the Homebrew package the MongoDB package can be installed with this commands:
{{{
$ brew update
$ brew install mongodb
}}}

===Binaries for various OS===
Binaries for OSX, Linux, Windows & Solaris can be found here: [http://www.mongodb.org/downloads]
